definition: to excuse sb/to exempt/to remove or dismiss from office/to avoid/to avert/to escape/to be prohibited
item/component/classifier for events, things, clothes etc

sentences.english: Freeware is software offered free of charge, downloadable off of the Internet.
sentences.chinese: 免費軟件就是不要錢的文件，可以從網上下載。

sentences.english: Unmaintained Free Software - A site which keeps track of orphaned Free Software projects.
sentences.chinese: 一個記錄無名免費軟件的站點。

sentences.english: Net, "free" high-speed mobile Internet software and shareware for free download.
sentences.chinese: 高速移動互聯網的免費軟件和共享軟件免費下載。

sentences.english: A piece of freeware I've been using asks for a $40 donation.
sentences.chinese: 我正在使用的一個免費軟件請求獲得40美元的募捐。

sentences.english: The FREEWARE utility supports long filenames , compressed and fragmented files.
sentences.chinese: 免費軟件程序支持長文件名，壓縮的和片段文件。

sentences.english: Before you spend a dime, take a look at all the freeware out there.
sentences.chinese: 在你花一個子兒之前，看一看已有的免費軟件。

sentences.english: You lose nothing if you download FREEWARE Edition of this program.
sentences.chinese: 你輸了什麼，如果你下載免費軟件版的這項計劃。

sentences.english: Google gives away its software in hopes of reaping profits from search advertising.
sentences.chinese: 谷歌希望通過免費軟件從搜索廣告方面獲利。

sentences.english: The good news for all of us is that most of these tools are freeware.
sentences.chinese: 好消息是這些工具大部分是免費軟件。
